title: How Coronavirus is Changing the Planet - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/13/20
itunes:title: How Coronavirus is Changing the Planet - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/13/20
description:
George Noory and scientist Peter Ward explore the changes the Earth is undergoing with decreased human activity during the coronavirus pandemic, including cleaner air and water, increasing wildlife and fewer earthquakes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
